name: Marriott Hotel Nanning

reviews.text: Just spent two nights at the Mariott Nanning, China. What a gem. New, modern, comfortable and friendly. Everyone of the staff were great, especially, Karen, the Front Dest Manager, Oscar, the F&B Manager, Sabrina and Aileen, at the front desk, and Rock, at the bell desk. I had a problem with my luggage, and Housekeeping fixed it. My room was a little hot, so the Front Desk sent up a great floor fan. Buffet dinner in the Marriott Cafe was outstanding, and breakfast in the Executive Lounge was also very good.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hotel in a Great City

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I highly recommend this Marriott...
reviews.title: Expensive! The underground parking lot is TERRIBLE! Not crowded in the hotel. Clean and bright room.

reviews.text: Marriott is the best hotel in Nanning now. I signed up for the member of Marriott Group and wanted to have my first stay experience in their hotel.
reviews.title: Almost Perfect

reviews.text: Its location is convenient. There are 2 main shopping malls in Nanning. One is the newly launched MixC and the other is Admiral City Mall. Marriott Hotel is right next to Admiral City Mall. However, there are few to shop here,much worse than MixC. The Nanning International Convention and Exhibition Centre is nearby. So its location is quite downtown.
reviews.title: Perfect for a business trip!

reviews.text: It was raining when we arrived in Nanning and the whole city was stuck in traffic jam. I could understand the traffic was busy in the main streets, but it was hardly for me to understand why we could be stuck for 1 hour at the entrance to the hotel parking lot!!! What's more ridiculous, there were non-stopped cars driving out of the underground parking lot on the other side. I have never had such experience before even when I was in big cities such as Guangzhou, Shenzhen or Hong Kong!
reviews.title: Probably the best hotel in Nanning

reviews.text: The marriott Nanning was one of the best Marriott hotels I've been to. Excellent service, very nice and modern rooms, and a fantastic breakfast buffet.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.text: service is great they speak english well
reviews.title: small rooms

reviews.text: the rooms are small but the bathroom is spacious
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: the bed is very comfortable and the room was very clean
reviews.title: Small but important things take the edge off an otherwise good hotel

reviews.text: I just came to this hotel after a stay at the Shanghai Waldorf-Astoria, so my sights were high. The bed, in fact, at this hotel was far more comfortable than the one in the W-A - and the standards in the room weren't that much removed which, given the difference in price, was quite astounding. I particularly enjoyed the breakfast (again, found it more diverse and satisfying than the W-A one) and the service, given that it was Nanning, was very professional. I would certainly return gladly!
reviews.title: Best hotel in Nanning

reviews.text: The location of this hotel is good enough for a business trip, with supermarket, restaurants, entertainment.
reviews.title: Suitable for business trip

reviews.text: provides with wonder big enough rooms and king size bed, areas divided clear, with a useful working desk. unfortunatelly and desk with glass surface so not suitable for most mouse, yet the hotel provides with a mouse pad. Meanwhile, you can connect your laptop to the LED screen, so that you can enjoy your home cinema.
reviews.title: Great hotel for a business trip
Best in town
reviews.text: The breakfast is quite rich, with fresh juice, this is unsusal for most hotels.

Stayed here two nights. Rooms were well appointed and the beds comfortable. Breakfast was very good with both western and eastern choices. Everything was clean and up to standards. The staff was friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: i hate to say, it is not like a marriot at all

reviews.text: It's the only choice in town if you want good level of clean, breakfast and staff.
reviews.title: Marriott is always Marriott no matter where it is

reviews.text: Excellent Marriott -just what the doctor ordered.
reviews.title: Just a Marriott!

reviews.text: A bit out of town but lovely decor and bedrooms etc etc.
reviews.title: Comfortable stay, little far from centre.

reviews.text: Highly recommended
reviews.title: Consistently excellent!

reviews.text: What always amazes me is the high standard of service in China - they really train their staff well.
reviews.title: Good looking hotel with room for improvement

reviews.text: I got a standard double room, which was a good size. Bed was comfortable, not the usual hard Chinese style mattress.
reviews.title: Good Hotel

description: Owned by Guangxi Xin Wei Hotel Management Co., Ltd. and managed by Marriott International, Inc., the Nanning Marriott Hotel officially opened its doors in December 2009. Located in the eastern area of Nanning’s CBD district, the hotel is a 35-minute drive away from Nanning Wuxu Airport. Diagonally across the hotel is the Nanning Exhibition Center, which is the permanent venue for the annual China-ASEAN Expo. The hotel is a part of Hangyang International Center and within walking distance to Admiral City shopping mall, Wuxiang Plaza and the Municipal Government office.The Nanning Marriott has 328 guest rooms comprising 141 Deluxe Rooms, 59 Superior Rooms, 63 Executive Rooms, 36 Executive Superior Rooms, 11 Junior Suites, 10 Deluxe Suites, 6 Executive Suites, 1 Ambassador Suite and 1 Presidential Suite. All rooms are located from the 8th floor and above, and all superior rooms face the Nanning Exhibition Centre. Each room caters to guests’ needs by providing high-speed internet connection and electronic safes.In order to meet the F&B requirements of guests, the Nanning Marriott has 5 restaurants, namely, the Marriott Cafe, Manho Chinese Restaurant, Lobby Lounge, Red Zen and Executive Lounge. Run by professional chefs, our restaurants serve unique Cantonese, Western and South East Asian dishes. Guests can also use the hotel’s Fitness Center and Spa facilities, which comprises 7 treatment rooms, indoor swimming pool, sauna, steam room, Jacuzzi, juice bar and hair salon. For successful events, the Nanning Marriott Hotel has banquet facilities set on 1,230 square meters, with a banquet hall area of 704 square meters and maximum seating capacity of 500 guests. A professional banquet service team will provide 5-star quality meals and attend to your requests.
